name: FlyVRX - Military Gunship Helicopter War
summary: A realistic Military Action Arcade style Helicopter Simulation that puts in direct thrilling combat action. Play either as a pilot with professional Helicopter control with your hand controllers or choose to be in the gunner seat with Heli in auto flying mode.  Fly over enemy military camps and hideouts in realistic mountainous and desert terrains. Hover over enemy captured oil rig in deep sea and gun down the enemy commandos in your gunner mode.
